comments.text: I have several filters setup which move messages into sub-folders based on certain criteria. These filters aren't run automatically, so at first all mail (IMAP) comes into my central local inbox. Sometimes I will double-click and open a message into a tab on its own to keep it up as I'm first browsing the new messages. If I THEN filter messages, and the message which is open in a tab is moved into a sub-folder through the filter action, then the message actually shown in the tab I opened changes. What appears to show up in the opened tab is the next message down in the inbox after the originally opened message was moved. The expected behavior would be that the originally opened message should stay visible in the opened tab. The tab contents shouldn't change just because that message was moved from one folder to another.
